snippet: Some members of Congress instead are threatening a devastating government default over the new health care reform.
abstract: Editorial welcomes fact that most Republicans in Congress are rejecting strident extremists in their party who want to shut down the government if health care reform is allowed to proceed; cautions that Republicans threatening a government default over health care is far more reckless and would inflict much greater damage.
lead_paragraph: Some members of Congress instead are threatening a devastating government default over the new health care reform.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
